name: Carrot Ginger Raisin Bread
description: This bread is very moist because of the carrot and a bit spicy because of the ginger and goes well with Chai Tea!
recipeIngredient: 2 inch ginger grated or pureed along with the carrots

recipeInstructions.text: Warm the water and add yeast and sugar to it. Let stand for 10 minutes or until frothy.
recipeInstructions.name: Warm the water and add yeast and sugar to it. Let stand for 10 minutes or until frothy.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the bread flour to the yeast mixture and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the bread flour to the yeast mixture and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the salt, and the carrot ginger puree and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the salt, and the carrot ginger puree and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the whole wheat flour,1 cup at a time and knead into a soft dough. Add more water if needed. The carrot will loose moisture during rising, so keep a dough a bit dry.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the whole wheat flour,1 cup at a time and knead into a soft dough. Add more water if needed. The carrot will loose moisture during rising, so keep a dough a bit dry.

recipeInstructions.text: Place dough in a warm place, covered, for about an hour or until doubled.
recipeInstructions.name: Place dough in a warm place, covered, for about an hour or until doubled.

recipeInstructions.text: Add some raisins to the dough and Knead for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add some raisins to the dough and Knead for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Shape dough into a loaf and place in a well greased bread pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Shape dough into a loaf and place in a well greased bread pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Place bread pan in warm oven, with a pan of boiling water for half an hour. Cover the bread pan with wet towel.
recipeInstructions.name: Place bread pan in warm oven, with a pan of boiling water for half an hour. Cover the bread pan with wet towel.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove water and towel and bake bread at 350 degrees F / 180ºc  for about 30-35 minutes. Spray some water on the bread 1-2 times in the first 10 minutes. This bread takes a bit longer because of the extra water content in the carrots.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove water and towel and bake bread at 350 degrees F / 180ºc  for about 30-35 minutes. Spray some water on the bread 1-2 times in the first 10 minutes. This bread takes a bit longer because of the extra water content in the carrots.

keywords: fruit bread, homemade bread, vegetable bread
